text: 6.11: Hi 11.40; VB 3.4-5; 3.18; 7.9; 7.13-14; 14.13; 19.14Mbe mbara shagi huri mpeeŋmpeein mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe bevbevira ntan mbe nɨɨŋgiap, khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde thaneŋ phorgɨ vhuksu. Nden pana gumgi, nde phorga ŋgari gumgi, mbe mbe shogɨp, nde phorga guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, mbe vhɨra mbe shogɨrim, mbe vhɨra vhɨzgirga. Mbe nde shogim, nde vhɨzgi tɨvara, mbe mbe shogɨrim, mbe vhɨzgirga. Fhe Bakɨme mbe mba shogɨrim vhɨzɨrga gumgi gu mbigi, ana mben vhɨrve kaŋgi. Mbe za mbe shogɨ ŋgɨp, mba tugɨra thɨgɨrga, mben pana gumgi za mbe shogɨrim, mbe za vhɨzgirga. Mba tugen Fhe Bakɨme nden vɨzi ŋgarkarga.”
